product_name: Royal Robbins Mountain Velvet Quarter-Zip Sweater - Women's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: With an irresistible soft touch and a comfortable amount of stretch, the Royal Robbins Mountain Velvet quarter-zip sweater will quickly become a favorite for travel and short outdoor treks. Both sides of the nylon/spandex fabric blend are brushed for a comfortable velvety feel. With a UPF 50+ rating, fabric provides excellent protection against harmful ultraviolet rays. Small zippered pocket on the right side secures a few essentials. Closeout.
short_description: With an irresistible soft touch and a comfortable amount of stretch, the Royal Robbins Mountain Velvet quarter-zip sweater will quickly become a favorite for travel and short outdoor treks.
